sentences.sentence: Potential sources are the aggregates of probable epicenters in the future.
sentences.translation: 潜在震源区是未来可能的震中集合体。

sentences.sentence: In this domain Ptolemy created a model of the solar system in 150 AD using circles and epicenters.
sentences.translation: 在这个领域，托勒密于公元150年创建使用圆圈和中心点创建了太阳系的一个模型。

sentences.sentence: Those two sunny cities were the twin epicenters of the condo boom, so maybe their comeuppance was to be expected.
sentences.translation: 这两个城市的繁华公寓地段都遭受了双重冲击，所以这种恶劣的状况也在预料之中。
